intro: This document serves as a comprehensive Land Cover/Land Use (LC/LU) nomenclature guideline specifically designed for the Copernicus Priority Area Monitoring product, Riparian Zones (RZ). It delivers detailed descriptions of all LC/LU classes within RZ, encompassing their geographic characteristics, relevant input datasets, and appropriate methods for class interpretation. The guideline aims to ensure consistent and accurate mapping of riparian environments across the EEA-38 + UK, supporting environmental monitoring and policy implementation.
